subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Jon Hood, a senior, will probably not see the court during the N.C.A.A. tournament, but he has had more teammates play in the N.B.A. than anyone in college basketball history.
snippet: Jon Hood, a senior, will probably not see the court during the N.C.A.A. tournament, but he has had more teammates play in the N.B.A. than anyone in college basketball history.
